ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes.   Seen on gamez.net/eq   its a rumor..  and hopefully a fact.  =) Let me know if anyone has any more info on the subject. Drev
ygData.messageBody:
Yes. Seen on gamez.net/eq its a rumor.. and hopefully a fact. =)

Let me know if anyone has any more info on the subject.

Drev

> ----------
> From: Billy Sun[SMTP:bsun@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 4:43 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Our class
>
> From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>
>
> Ice Comet? Is it another undocumented spell?
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Ken Lee <kenlee@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 9:40 AM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Our class
>
>
> > From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>
> >
> > NO WAY!! Sure it's terrible at the start, and other classes kick our
> butts.
> > Let me tell you what happens when you hit level 12.
> > Shock of lightning. 78 pts of instantaneous damage, and ye look cool
> becaue
> > lots of things keel over to the sound of a thunderclap.
> > Barbarian warriors of equal level will be doing, 23-25 pts max per round.
> > That's NOTHING compared to what we do. We are the masters of dishing out
> > damage. The problem is you need to want to last long enough.
> >
> > BTW, did I mention that we get a spell called Ice Comet that hits for 1100
> > pts. of damage? No mistake, ELEVEN HUNDRED. It's the most powerful damage
> > spell in the game. If you look at your hp meter sometime you'll notice the
> > max is 1000.
> >
> > 'Nuff said.
> >
> > Zalbar
> > 14th Wizard
> > Solusek Ro
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
> > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> > Date: 18 avril, 1999 13:55
> > Subject: [eq_wizards] Our class
> >
> >
> > >From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
> > >
> > >Just wondering how other people feel about our Wizard class. It seems to
> me
> > >that we are short-changed compared to magicians and necromancers, whose
> > >spells seem a lot better, and can have "pets" fight for them. It's also
> > >hard to make signifant amounts of money to buy spells. I still like the
> > >game, just wondered if anyone else felt the same way.
> > >
> > >Greg (Kronan)
